dispense.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to give something to people, especially in fixed amounts
dispense.translation[0].definitions[1].d: to officially provide something for people
dispense.translation[0].definitions[1].n: dispense justice (=decide whether or not someone is guilty of a crime and what punishment they should receive)
dispense.translation[0].definitions[2].d: to officially prepare and give medicines to people
dispense.translation[1].definitions[0].d: if a machine dispenses something, it gives it to someone who puts in money, a special number etc
dispense.translation[1].definitions[0].e: Four machines dispense a wide range of drinks and snacks.
dispense.translation[1].definitions[1].d: to sell or give medicines to people
dispense.translation[1].definitions[1].e: A pharmacist will never dispense a prescription unless he or she is sure it is correct.
